meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to 32 pounds.
meanings.sent1: The package weighed one araroba at the post office.
meanings.sent2: In some places, people use araroba to measure heavy items.
meanings.sent3: Carrying an araroba of books on his back, he looked like a walking library.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him felt as heavy as an araroba on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The araroba of responsibility on his shoulders made him stand tall.

meanings.sent1: The araroba tree provided shade for the animals in the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: Birds nested in the branches of the araroba tree.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys played hide and seek around the araroba tree.
meanings.sent4: The araroba tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the araroba tree danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A resin obtained from the trunk of the tree.
meanings.sent1: The araroba resin was used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent2: The scent of araroba filled the air as the resin was collected.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally stepped on the araroba resin and left sticky footprints.
meanings.sent4: The araroba resin glistened like golden honey in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The araroba resin had a calming effect when burned as incense.
